package.name: cadence_fbpixel
package.summary: This extension allows you to quickly implement Facebook tracking and conversion code on your Magento store. Supports Visitor Tracking and Conversion (Checkout) Pixels
package.description:
This Facebook Conversion Code extension allows you to quickly implement Facebook tracking pixels for website visits and conversions (purchases) within your Magento store. Learn how it works..

You may set pixel ids for:

  • Facebook Visitor Pixel (code is displayed on every page)
  • Facebook Conversion Pixel (code is displayed only upon successful checkout)

Click here to view the official Facebook Tracking & Conversion Code User Guide with detailed step-by-step instructions.

Tracks Currency & Grand Total

This extension supports stores with multiple currencies, and tracks both the order grand total & order currency (conversion pixel only).
